We are extremely appreciative to Necho for allowing us to modify our booking without penalty and also allowing us a late check out! Necho (Host) was very responsive and super friendly. We contacted Necho immediately and we were very impressed with his understanding and attentiveness to our concerns due to the COVID pandemic. He was very apologetic and shared his dilemma with keeping housekeeping staff due to COVID. He immediately addressed and went above and beyond to rectify our issues. He also agreed to move us to an adjacent property to ensure we were comfortable. We really appreciated the quick response and customer service provided.
Necho also provided us a personal tour of the adjacent four properties which will be undergoing renovations. It was very nice to be able to wander into each room of each home. We were able to see some very interesting architectural features of the homes.
The property has some nice spaces, but could use a little more TLC to be awesome. But it's still a great place! It will more appealing once the major upgrades and renovations are completed.
